body:
LAMA - Log and Alarm Management Application
===========================================

This application is designed to handle alarms, SNMP traps, syslog logging,
configuration management as well as other useful functions needed in 
production systems.

Refer to docs/index.html for the documentation.

Regards,

Serge <saleyn@gmail.com>
name: Lama
